Postman

# 

<span key="1e5cb25185c6481d92e1f4cb4f1ec05a"><span offset-key="1e5cb25185c6481d92e1f4cb4f1ec05a:0">Introduction</span></span>

<span key="6dfdcff5485a4fa4bb443fd362164d50"><span offset-key="6dfdcff5485a4fa4bb443fd362164d50:0">Welcome to the Postman docs! This is the place to find official information on how to use Postman in your API projects.</span></span>

<span key="fd66c85e111a48efbeff8a0a5cc97556"><span offset-key="fd66c85e111a48efbeff8a0a5cc97556:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://assets.postman.com/postman-docs/postman-app-default-v8.jpg" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a925b1e90bf94bf185531619ab08da25" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="b4a3fe4b394d4f8988dcdcf24ce5d6cf"><span data-offset-key="b4a3fe4b394d4f8988dcdcf24ce5d6cf:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="3db4d69312a24d67a037de407a9a6bbb"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="bf3a3ed2216d4b64ad9cd3f3bf80322f"><span offset-key="bf3a3ed2216d4b64ad9cd3f3bf80322f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="aaa9ee25c5a94ce7b6378dc5aef9bf15"><span offset-key="aaa9ee25c5a94ce7b6378dc5aef9bf15:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="b0716893533d4cfcb7c3e6785e15f117"><span offset-key="b0716893533d4cfcb7c3e6785e15f117:0">If you're just starting to learn about APIs and Postman, you can use a variety of channels both in and outside Postman:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="1c5c285f20ad441684004d5d8be83b76"><span offset-key="1c5c285f20ad441684004d5d8be83b76:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/getting-started/sending-the-first-request/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c1cb5d2a6b1f4df6b417137df1a55e85" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="c15209722d654e07bda4423f96a357a1"><strong>Send your first request!</strong></span></span></a><span key="82b78b4f20764e2ab5e5a373961be1a0"><span offset-key="82b78b4f20764e2ab5e5a373961be1a0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="9bc57b218cf14bccba7d59dbee22c48a"><span offset-key="9bc57b218cf14bccba7d59dbee22c48a:0">Use the </span>**Bootcamp**<span offset-key="9bc57b218cf14bccba7d59dbee22c48a:2"> to work through lessons inside Postman—open it at the bottom right of the app.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="74907777d4204fdcaebd05e2d01cd2b6"><span offset-key="74907777d4204fdcaebd05e2d01cd2b6:0">Explore </span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/explore" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="df2b58b852044ef3b1f686d4fa275cac" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="a3081216ca544cb18fa7530ebd1122b7"><span data-offset-key="a3081216ca544cb18fa7530ebd1122b7:0">workspaces, collections, and more</span></span></span></a><span key="25ac5dae3f554fa4a03966e9fd770e2e"><span offset-key="25ac5dae3f554fa4a03966e9fd770e2e:0"> that you can try out inside Postman, like the following:</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="1e240757a0db4090a8315b91f9817828"><span offset-key="1e240757a0db4090a8315b91f9817828:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/postman/workspace/published-postman-templates/collection/9065401-ff29b3be-af69-4442-91e0-c1158b620fc2?ctx=documentation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="dddc935798494c03a929b066d182b969" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="5a22fa03ce434df687ea4b65a1b1b75b"><strong>Learn by API</strong></span></span></a><span key="effde06513594cb1a9d0d518823c6f7e"><span offset-key="effde06513594cb1a9d0d518823c6f7e:0">–walk through beginner API concepts.</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="eeb0fd66d9884c3388440c2bf3fd159c"><span offset-key="eeb0fd66d9884c3388440c2bf3fd159c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/postman/workspace/postman-galaxy-training/overview" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0728014267e74f28aa96aaf7aaca1eff" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="a2ccd148a6b5432b878cc1224386d350"><strong>Postman Training</strong></span></span></a><span key="20419266256f4dc5a32d50d8cc10fe3b"><span offset-key="20419266256f4dc5a32d50d8cc10fe3b:0">–Learn APIs 101, Testing and Automation, API Adoption, and API First, earning </span></span><a href="https://badgr.com/public/issuers/BC0x4AQaQPC7lFilsBP_tQ/badges" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8ddc543ea66248ccb1ee40370670ac56" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="4fcc97dab6cd4a95b1f7df2cafcfd240"><span data-offset-key="4fcc97dab6cd4a95b1f7df2cafcfd240:0">Postman badges</span></span></span></a><span key="0e16fbba83374810b77ba4ed74e5abf5"><span offset-key="0e16fbba83374810b77ba4ed74e5abf5:0">.</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="ba93fb2406734a9bb77e8739e69f5726"><span offset-key="ba93fb2406734a9bb77e8739e69f5726:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/postman/workspace/postman-student-program/overview" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8557af1def3e4306aad1b558bb1f11cf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="5f7e80a03efa46628d94e0dbf17d07f5"><strong>Student Program</strong></span></span></a><span key="048b319f8e234e8fbc2f7c17277d3fa0"><span offset-key="048b319f8e234e8fbc2f7c17277d3fa0:0">–Take the Student Expert training, covering request configurations and test scripting.</span></span>

<span key="d35744a4fe09497f9878084a4b967e93"><span offset-key="d35744a4fe09497f9878084a4b967e93:0">What are you here to learn about?</span></span>

<span key="3b18c9fd4ab0456fa484f6317c9053a5"><span offset-key="3b18c9fd4ab0456fa484f6317c9053a5:0">If you're learning to carry out a specific task or workflow in Postman, check out the following topics to find resources:</span></span>

    <span key="e77e292f6d954c14acd207857b599565"><span offset-key="e77e292f6d954c14acd207857b599565:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/getting-started/introduction/#making-requests" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="82835aac79c742b986ed08142d373c43" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="f6dee0f7de9f41cb8147ee2f3d723c75"><strong>Making requests</strong></span></span></a><span key="4174a6c0d47d4028a2688512f14e5353"><span offset-key="4174a6c0d47d4028a2688512f14e5353:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="1a7e75a1bae0446ebb34f12c1b699e2e"><span offset-key="1a7e75a1bae0446ebb34f12c1b699e2e:0">Making requests</span></span>

<span key="8ce9f5e531dd4c24a577123131500233"><span offset-key="8ce9f5e531dd4c24a577123131500233:0">If you're building a client app or just need to connect to an API, check out some Postman essentials:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="a7e6b06502f04f3b9f91db3e30d5e9ff"><span offset-key="a7e6b06502f04f3b9f91db3e30d5e9ff:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/requests/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="94b243b6750947deacacd59825f734d9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="ce24c5715f4649c29030c6549d1947bb"><span data-offset-key="ce24c5715f4649c29030c6549d1947bb:0">Connecting to APIs</span></span></span></a><span key="49565dd2e72e4238ae7bf744ce97eca9"><span offset-key="49565dd2e72e4238ae7bf744ce97eca9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="fe5790ca007c40aa9f49c912caa477cd"><span offset-key="fe5790ca007c40aa9f49c912caa477cd:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6b9f27fc554e4935afcd2381c94cbe52" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="9c3ca265750b4619a80c3eafeea92e90"><span data-offset-key="9c3ca265750b4619a80c3eafeea92e90:0">Authorizing requests</span></span></span></a><span key="b074b3aa77d54ec3bf8c28872e09849c"><span offset-key="b074b3aa77d54ec3bf8c28872e09849c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="cc4cd6db224340d498c832b7be14314b"><span offset-key="cc4cd6db224340d498c832b7be14314b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/intro-to-collections/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5e24565a784c477caf3466c47aeaf73a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="6a2396006c0148ecb360a1eda74c5918"><span data-offset-key="6a2396006c0148ecb360a1eda74c5918:0">Grouping requests in collections</span></span></span></a><span key="31e5709cad4c47c1baad4d3b9100c06b"><span offset-key="31e5709cad4c47c1baad4d3b9100c06b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

### 

<span key="5a6d09e71b2d40d19535e9f7c8ad9599"><span offset-key="5a6d09e71b2d40d19535e9f7c8ad9599:0">Testing APIs</span></span>

<span key="7b3b7cff8edb40a48575c2e12cbe20a1"><span offset-key="7b3b7cff8edb40a48575c2e12cbe20a1:0">If you're testing an API, you can use Postman to automate various parts of the process:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="fb40b318044a46809eb7cfdb60bbe768"><span offset-key="fb40b318044a46809eb7cfdb60bbe768:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/test-scripts/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8c4c7c2a957f4c159a7d6d767a91f6e8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d8027bcb20f24e59981d1bfc9d84b658"><span data-offset-key="d8027bcb20f24e59981d1bfc9d84b658:0">Writing test scripts</span></span></span></a><span key="14eb3882e0584a8e939397759ca087c9"><span offset-key="14eb3882e0584a8e939397759ca087c9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="b6863423990449539c954d21d1bee001"><span offset-key="b6863423990449539c954d21d1bee001:0">Providing feedback</span></span>

<span key="1bc0ad1212774478bd708f718f6839be"><span offset-key="1bc0ad1212774478bd708f718f6839be:0">Share your thoughts on the documentation and help the Postman team to improve it for yourself and other learners! To submit feedback, please </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/issues" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="922fd78c9f8d46968ea79937b123643f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="281309600bd74b8db16932f927f11ef3"><span data-offset-key="281309600bd74b8db16932f927f11ef3:0">create an issue on the documentation GitHub repo</span></span></span></a><span key="e74fc5c1421c4480a8de151b3298220c"><span offset-key="e74fc5c1421c4480a8de151b3298220c:0"> or post in the </span></span><a href="https://community.postman.com" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0260a673f19446e6a7c299a3373a84f6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d16eec17449d4a1fbb7c83ef3ee8ada9"><span data-offset-key="d16eec17449d4a1fbb7c83ef3ee8ada9:0">community forum</span></span></span></a><span key="823413f474644510b8bf267956c1ccd5"><span offset-key="823413f474644510b8bf267956c1ccd5:0">.</span></span>

<span key="9c6a27c79a9440d88c25eecc846a1432"><span offset-key="9c6a27c79a9440d88c25eecc846a1432:0">Help improve Postman and have an impact on </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-app-support/projects/45?fullscreen=true" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3e15d8ad47f14715b2c03a3fb5b28f7c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="c5708a04fe4d4e869dbe8e929c642fbe"><span data-offset-key="c5708a04fe4d4e869dbe8e929c642fbe:0">Postman's roadmap</span></span></span></a><span key="6185bfbb226d48df99530049419295d7"><span offset-key="6185bfbb226d48df99530049419295d7:0"> by sending your feedback directly to Postman's developer team. To submit feature requests, </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-app-support/issues" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2a308aad4fce44a784a7c0e6e609d841" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="6aac6a2f9830427c88fe3185fbb63221"><span data-offset-key="6aac6a2f9830427c88fe3185fbb63221:0">create an issue on the Postman GitHub repo</span></span></span></a><span key="b79043d86e114dd68d8de89e24a7b28d"><span offset-key="b79043d86e114dd68d8de89e24a7b28d:0">.</span></span>

<span key="73502a2506124b43bd8eca56c38dc05f"><span offset-key="73502a2506124b43bd8eca56c38dc05f:0"> To get the latest version of the Postman desktop app, visit the </span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f8c5f968b96543d4922fad35fc8423bd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="fe6006dc74f74c8796606a95a35717bd"><span data-offset-key="fe6006dc74f74c8796606a95a35717bd:0">download page</span></span></span></a><span key="2cff858581a944cb95e2b9a100fd6664"><span offset-key="2cff858581a944cb95e2b9a100fd6664:0"> and select </span>**Download**<span offset-key="2cff858581a944cb95e2b9a100fd6664:2"> for your platform.</span></span>

##

    <span key="34953d79d4ad49ec8a020806ddaca8fb"><span offset-key="34953d79d4ad49ec8a020806ddaca8fb:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/src/pages/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates.md#postman-chrome-app-deprecated" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c00429b3a0ec4a1e8c775be75f61e58e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d839c9b182e24f9e9fc987e2c8fc8a5e"><span data-offset-key="d839c9b182e24f9e9fc987e2c8fc8a5e:0">Chrome app (deprecated)</span></span></span></a><span key="7022dcd762324608ad896da9cca71a32"><span offset-key="7022dcd762324608ad896da9cca71a32:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

        <span key="5071992394d14586aed9f94860ee4ec2"><span offset-key="5071992394d14586aed9f94860ee4ec2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/src/pages/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates.md#migrating-to-the-native-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="31388671eb044088921e3a986ab5ac26" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="1e610c60ba1a45519ccb3dabd92a4caa"><span data-offset-key="1e610c60ba1a45519ccb3dabd92a4caa:0">Migrating to the native app</span></span></span></a><span key="bb1a4d413cad47cc8825375d9992f119"><span offset-key="bb1a4d413cad47cc8825375d9992f119:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

    <span key="ae0a456f63c147f5ae9ce881cfeaefea"><span offset-key="ae0a456f63c147f5ae9ce881cfeaefea:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/src/pages/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates.md#using-postman-behind-a-firewall" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1d66c1c61d664a56a393f69fc0d89425" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="0df6977822be4433b645e7c770f4d553"><span data-offset-key="0df6977822be4433b645e7c770f4d553:0">Using Postman behind a firewall</span></span></span></a><span key="9124f7f5595b42b7bf7d45e940b896f2"><span offset-key="9124f7f5595b42b7bf7d45e940b896f2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="08484042bb454eff8ddd8a0d9afbf94a"><span offset-key="08484042bb454eff8ddd8a0d9afbf94a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/src/pages/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates.md#troubleshooting-your-postman-installation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f5d53c97578b42659a5eb91e5feeb4ab" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="9a092b237cdb4db89d161b8791692456"><span data-offset-key="9a092b237cdb4db89d161b8791692456:0">Troubleshooting your Postman installation</span></span></span></a><span key="2e716bff000342d8ade14ea9acce4319"><span offset-key="2e716bff000342d8ade14ea9acce4319:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="3adbe937080f4d00bbe2c733f545fe8f"><span offset-key="3adbe937080f4d00bbe2c733f545fe8f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/src/pages/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates.md#next-steps" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="99f55c0f38cb4b7dac6e44bbdd38a441" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="cd1dd2c675374f6c96ab1e30f1ae2af2"><span data-offset-key="cd1dd2c675374f6c96ab1e30f1ae2af2:0">Next steps</span></span></span></a><span key="adcd9512a2d3436d9c632a6b20b4e262"><span offset-key="adcd9512a2d3436d9c632a6b20b4e262:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

> <span key="0740da9a2af843238437f8c1580d51a5"><span offset-key="0740da9a2af843238437f8c1580d51a5:0">Note that the Postman team only tests, fixes bugs, and provides support for the app on Mac, Windows, Linux, and the web.</span></span>

## 

<span key="d7b802db1ee74972864323bb742b4121"><span offset-key="d7b802db1ee74972864323bb742b4121:0">Installing Postman on Mac</span></span>

<span key="968987a00ac44564ada60409bf3c7410"><span offset-key="968987a00ac44564ada60409bf3c7410:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c11d7cc0fbd54f958e37a27b3d56afc8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="5ce24b977ff4406b97747ae13dc12da2"><span data-offset-key="5ce24b977ff4406b97747ae13dc12da2:0">Download</span></span></span></a><span key="d2c9793d73a7472a8fab09b0764d978b"><span offset-key="d2c9793d73a7472a8fab09b0764d978b:0"> and unzip the app </span>*using the built-in Archive Utility app*<span offset-key="d2c9793d73a7472a8fab09b0764d978b:2">. Double-click </span>**Postman**<span offset-key="d2c9793d73a7472a8fab09b0764d978b:4">. When prompted, move the file to your </span>**Applications**<span offset-key="d2c9793d73a7472a8fab09b0764d978b:6"> folder—this will ensure that future updates can be installed correctly.</span></span>

> <span key="5f49ce327b6f48ee80b9209383a1dff2"><span offset-key="5f49ce327b6f48ee80b9209383a1dff2:0">The minimum OS version supported is macOS 10.11 (El Capitan).</span></span>
>
> <span key="d01bd61fcfdf45b49934eae7d0a615eb"><span offset-key="d01bd61fcfdf45b49934eae7d0a615eb:0">You may encounter a "Library not loaded" error if you attempt to unzip and install Postman using a third-party app—using the default Archive Utility for Mac should resolve this.</span></span>

## 

<span key="dbdb8e745b6f4fb690a98bee80e63ba7"><span offset-key="dbdb8e745b6f4fb690a98bee80e63ba7:0">Installing Postman on Windows</span></span>

<span key="dd6e136dc52a49828a3aa4232de521d7"><span offset-key="dd6e136dc52a49828a3aa4232de521d7:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f3cc325baaf44a2bbc9c5dc9060d5c42" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="6f210ae2afea4b5e88ee467d7f0e48e2"><span data-offset-key="6f210ae2afea4b5e88ee467d7f0e48e2:0">Download</span></span></span></a><span key="7bda838b8f3a4bddaf4e36c601e4cf5e"><span offset-key="7bda838b8f3a4bddaf4e36c601e4cf5e:0"> the app. Double-click the </span>`exe`<span offset-key="7bda838b8f3a4bddaf4e36c601e4cf5e:2"> file to install it.</span></span>

> <span key="0e45c822d9364129af26412baa5b7eee"><span offset-key="0e45c822d9364129af26412baa5b7eee:0">Postman supports Windows 7 and above. Both </span>`ia32 (x86)`<span offset-key="0e45c822d9364129af26412baa5b7eee:2"> and </span>`x64 (amd64)`<span offset-key="0e45c822d9364129af26412baa5b7eee:4"> installers are available for Windows. Windows for ARM devices is possible by using the ia32 binary.</span></span>

## 

<span key="f842992c0e6944d28e7ea04a22bbf70a"><span offset-key="f842992c0e6944d28e7ea04a22bbf70a:0">Installing Postman on Linux</span></span>

<span key="00ea2030b98e428cbf2b7c08b877e3ca"><span offset-key="00ea2030b98e428cbf2b7c08b877e3ca:0">You can install Postman on Linux by manually downloading it, using the </span></span><a href="https://snapcraft.io/postman" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8d2e4902d32c4509b131d6c700a40324" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="7b6ea7b3594a4235a0cbbfb618213892"><span data-offset-key="7b6ea7b3594a4235a0cbbfb618213892:0">Snap</span></span></span></a><span key="732f05622850494d92c238f0fc8466f4"><span offset-key="732f05622850494d92c238f0fc8466f4:0"> store link, or with the command </span>`snap install postman`<span offset-key="732f05622850494d92c238f0fc8466f4:2">.</span></span>

<span key="1cfc7e3f49c343e6ad1553ba701cdd46"><span offset-key="1cfc7e3f49c343e6ad1553ba701cdd46:0">To install manually, </span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f4bab79fe0354337a1079823a0c55ae7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d38ac5eb0ff14d26a8391f71c2fbc456"><span data-offset-key="d38ac5eb0ff14d26a8391f71c2fbc456:0">download</span></span></span></a><span key="db632a4d11134c80b1839e8f90c0b423"><span offset-key="db632a4d11134c80b1839e8f90c0b423:0"> and unzip the app, for example into the </span>`opt`<span offset-key="db632a4d11134c80b1839e8f90c0b423:2"> directory. You will need </span>`sudo`<span offset-key="db632a4d11134c80b1839e8f90c0b423:4"> privileges.</span></span>

<span key="2ef8de94f1754076b0536aa9fcd03249"><span offset-key="2ef8de94f1754076b0536aa9fcd03249:0">To start the app from a launcher icon, create a desktop file, naming it </span>`Postman.desktop`<span offset-key="2ef8de94f1754076b0536aa9fcd03249:2"> and saving it in the following location:</span></span>

1

<span key="37a42ce0a0ca4eb1af2e70d66da0feb1"><span offset-key="37a42ce0a0ca4eb1af2e70d66da0feb1:0">~/.local/share/applications/Postman.desktop</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

Copied!

<span key="75b98e75fed34010be86542b65fc9369"><span offset-key="75b98e75fed34010be86542b65fc9369:0">Enter the following content in the file—replacing </span>`opt`<span offset-key="75b98e75fed34010be86542b65fc9369:2"> if you extracted the file somewhere else—and save it:</span></span>

1

<span key="845c6b810d4d4d759c072d8e369b404e"><span offset-key="845c6b810d4d4d759c072d8e369b404e:0">\[Desktop Entry\]</span></span>

2

<span key="96677ea9db0d494bbcc2f5c9e2a0b36e"><span offset-key="96677ea9db0d494bbcc2f5c9e2a0b36e:0">Encoding=UTF-8</span></span>

3

<span key="ad956ca155984e1885d4cd3fe69a6a4d"><span offset-key="ad956ca155984e1885d4cd3fe69a6a4d:0">Name=Postman</span></span>

4

<span key="229bb2090dd4475faaca3f7e8ef95c49"><span offset-key="229bb2090dd4475faaca3f7e8ef95c49:0">Exec=/opt/Postman/app/Postman %U</span></span>

5

<span key="83cd58d6d32d4891ba5d3f8044d2e7b5"><span offset-key="83cd58d6d32d4891ba5d3f8044d2e7b5:0">Icon=/opt/Postman/app/resources/app/assets/icon.png</span></span>

6

<span key="0396db5126904e098e8c6d67d667c777"><span offset-key="0396db5126904e098e8c6d67d667c777:0">Terminal=false</span></span>

7

<span key="b5b9654ac8b6419089a7f080904c6430"><span offset-key="b5b9654ac8b6419089a7f080904c6430:0">Type=Application</span></span>

8

<span key="7e7751f90b68458686633b649a452bab"><span offset-key="7e7751f90b68458686633b649a452bab:0">Categories=Development;</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

> <span key="b3a0aa27e8d5422198fd7ba58c8f4221"><span offset-key="b3a0aa27e8d5422198fd7ba58c8f4221:0">Postman supports the following distributions:</span></span>
>
> -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />
>
>     <span key="486337e7c94c4c3b8462cf5919487121"><span offset-key="486337e7c94c4c3b8462cf5919487121:0">Ubuntu 14.04 and newer</span></span>
>
> -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />
>
>     <span key="e4ef817a99c84d64ab7c0eaa1cb0c2c1"><span offset-key="e4ef817a99c84d64ab7c0eaa1cb0c2c1:0">Fedora 24</span></span>
>
> -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />
>
>     <span key="55a5102c3c0a455c89bb01fa00b1cafc"><span offset-key="55a5102c3c0a455c89bb01fa00b1cafc:0">Debian 8 and newer</span></span>
>
> <span key="cde1dd606f5c40d2b657f0e81c4e711e"><span offset-key="cde1dd606f5c40d2b657f0e81c4e711e:0">The support of certain Linux distributions depends on if they are supported by Electron. Refer to </span></span><a href="https://www.electronjs.org/docs/tutorial/support#linux" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f24a53d3471e4b47b39598b0cab10f0a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="f2703677a4514ac8b3628ae7758004c4"><span data-offset-key="f2703677a4514ac8b3628ae7758004c4:0">Electron's documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="edd73b4cd3b14ef7a1539d5adb4182c4"><span offset-key="edd73b4cd3b14ef7a1539d5adb4182c4:0">.</span></span>
>
> <span key="2b9098e1b6044bbe9d38057269882257"><span offset-key="2b9098e1b6044bbe9d38057269882257:0">It is recommended you install </span></span><a href="https://snapcraft.io/postman" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="eafcb5db5b5b4bb5a64f1abdc2afadbf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="df100736f8b6495f8a8e98c62fb8587f"><span data-offset-key="df100736f8b6495f8a8e98c62fb8587f:0">Snap</span></span></span></a><span key="d3748661db4848918b257078327ee31f"><span offset-key="d3748661db4848918b257078327ee31f:0"> as it includes all the libraries that the app needs and they are bundled with the app itself.</span></span>
>
> <span key="efb1df6eecb84fd484a973bd5af239bd"><span offset-key="efb1df6eecb84fd484a973bd5af239bd:0">Avoid starting Postman using the </span>`sudo`<span offset-key="efb1df6eecb84fd484a973bd5af239bd:2"> command, as it will create permission issues on the files created by Postman.</span></span>
>
> <span key="3a2a4cb10e1d43de981985e602bebb88"><span offset-key="3a2a4cb10e1d43de981985e602bebb88:0">Make sure you have read/write permission for the </span>`~/.config`<span offset-key="3a2a4cb10e1d43de981985e602bebb88:2"> folder where Postman stores information.</span></span>
>
> <span key="a3ccf2a972c34d41a639b85842f4ecdd"><span offset-key="a3ccf2a972c34d41a639b85842f4ecdd:0">If you are an Ubuntu 18 user, you will also need to install the </span>`libgconf-2-4`<span offset-key="a3ccf2a972c34d41a639b85842f4ecdd:2"> package with the command </span>`apt-get install libgconf-2-4`</span>

## 

<span key="51f1403ca61b49f881cc3568a65e715a"><span offset-key="51f1403ca61b49f881cc3568a65e715a:0">Using Postman on the web</span></span>

<span key="f3c6034c74654c60aa5518357cf2d6c1"><span offset-key="f3c6034c74654c60aa5518357cf2d6c1:0">You can use Postman in your web browser to carry out your API development and testing tasks in conjunction with the Postman Agent. To access Postman on the web, visit </span></span><a href="https://go.postman.co/home" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2e49d6227bd44f9584892f15b2fd5724" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="82079f0061d04eafa03c8f6c93a5863e"><span data-offset-key="82079f0061d04eafa03c8f6c93a5863e:0">go.postman.co/home</span></span></span></a><span key="a2f9df063ee547f8a9fe9c5608f7d0c5"><span offset-key="a2f9df063ee547f8a9fe9c5608f7d0c5:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="9b28e67b318c408fa613b667a99cbf1f"><span offset-key="9b28e67b318c408fa613b667a99cbf1f:0">Browser requirements</span></span>

<span key="1e79e4f2bb894491a8ae0e0f5761d3d3"><span offset-key="1e79e4f2bb894491a8ae0e0f5761d3d3:0">Postman’s web application is optimized for the following browsers:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="fd3f2ed00e234c6c9c4096db01f1ab56"><span offset-key="fd3f2ed00e234c6c9c4096db01f1ab56:0">Chrome (78 and higher)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1e14efa4c2e9489ba79413263e424741"><span offset-key="1e14efa4c2e9489ba79413263e424741:0">Firefox (76 and higher)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="6ca8b1c7e92d48e6a69699d79609b675"><span offset-key="6ca8b1c7e92d48e6a69699d79609b675:0">Edge (79 and higher)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="93f91fd66af84950b1eb0e93d1757588"><span offset-key="93f91fd66af84950b1eb0e93d1757588:0">Safari (13.1.1 and higher)</span></span>

### 

<span key="0481baa9f0ca48b78e0a6ec3cfb176c4"><span offset-key="0481baa9f0ca48b78e0a6ec3cfb176c4:0">Installing the Postman desktop agent</span></span>

<span key="623c194e27254cbaaf9cd3d7a5bebdf0"><span offset-key="623c194e27254cbaaf9cd3d7a5bebdf0:0">If you are using the Postman web client, you will need to also download the Postman desktop agent. You will be prompted to download and install the agent so that you can make requests from the web. You can also download the agent directly from </span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="499a576d5ee84af69608a5ead050dfe5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d908517b92d1417b91d3913173eede20"><span data-offset-key="d908517b92d1417b91d3913173eede20:0">the Downloads page</span></span></span></a><span key="ed7711c998e2459396105f407714d386"><span offset-key="ed7711c998e2459396105f407714d386:0">.</span></span>

<span key="de55f874c5ce4b03a3afbea635bd6c70"><span offset-key="de55f874c5ce4b03a3afbea635bd6c70:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2fc0384c7b91aacf1f2497f1fa70cc024bf8f19b0a12652a990bb1d8739780e4/68747470733a2f2f6173736574732e706f73746d616e2e636f6d2f706f73746d616e2d646f63732f646f776e6c6f61642d6167656e742d7638362e6a7067" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="fd9904365c73491c8c53d043492c68de" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="9d6743ffce4046759e183880033b4e85"><span data-offset-key="9d6743ffce4046759e183880033b4e85:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="f2ae1ec0e0ca44c893be5dbe83f56008"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="64167c86cccb4f868ee4893a0d6eb5a0"><span offset-key="64167c86cccb4f868ee4893a0d6eb5a0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="a5f7417cf02747f286bdae176d8cb8e9"><span offset-key="a5f7417cf02747f286bdae176d8cb8e9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="41ab546f129f459baa60285905f4d6c8"><span offset-key="41ab546f129f459baa60285905f4d6c8:0">The Postman agent overcomes the Cross Object Resource Sharing (CORS) limitations of browsers, and facilitates API request sending from your browser version of Postman. Once you have the agent installed you will be able to use it with web requests.</span></span>

<span key="623bf99c9f9b4f3289bc4bbadcbd6203"><span offset-key="623bf99c9f9b4f3289bc4bbadcbd6203:0">You can either enable </span>**Auto-select**<span offset-key="623bf99c9f9b4f3289bc4bbadcbd6203:2"> option or manually select the agent (</span>**Cloud**<span offset-key="623bf99c9f9b4f3289bc4bbadcbd6203:4">, </span>**Desktop**<span offset-key="623bf99c9f9b4f3289bc4bbadcbd6203:6">, or </span>**Browser**<span offset-key="623bf99c9f9b4f3289bc4bbadcbd6203:8">) you would like to use for your requests.</span></span>

<span key="975e0f06382742e3ac6deda6026061d3"><span offset-key="975e0f06382742e3ac6deda6026061d3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/8b042765d4eb6d7d9f6de43c12978f27c00111025ecfcdcd6059181b7a69c1bc/68747470733a2f2f6173736574732e706f73746d616e2e636f6d2f706f73746d616e2d646f63732f73656c6563742d6167656e742d666f722d72657175657374732e676966" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ff5bab9f4fe64384b0f355ca1b1f7420" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="85f825f76476498095ef8fc6bfccfa15"><span data-offset-key="85f825f76476498095ef8fc6bfccfa15:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="49f36a8da9c84f87bee91a7253e34aa9"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="c26283ac14ef4e1aae9acc0fb83e3cb1"><span offset-key="c26283ac14ef4e1aae9acc0fb83e3cb1:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="3ab3084971c34d8ca7c40b01d1f25192"><span offset-key="3ab3084971c34d8ca7c40b01d1f25192:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="db5c260576134a87ab6296925c67df3b"><span offset-key="db5c260576134a87ab6296925c67df3b:0">Once you enable the option for </span>**Auto-select**<span offset-key="db5c260576134a87ab6296925c67df3b:2">, Postman will automatically select the best agent for your requests.</span></span>

<span key="1186e70492364c63af30f65254e92426"><span offset-key="1186e70492364c63af30f65254e92426:0">You can select the </span>**Cloud Agent**<span offset-key="1186e70492364c63af30f65254e92426:2"> if you want to send HTTP requests via Postman's secure cloud servers. While using the locally running Postman, it is recommended you use the </span>**Desktop Agent**<span offset-key="1186e70492364c63af30f65254e92426:4">. Using the </span>**Browser Agent**<span offset-key="1186e70492364c63af30f65254e92426:6"> for your web requests has some </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates/#web-limitations" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="db6497c1ef5a4f01a92c82a73abd8bc3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="652cead29f1b445494c19e0b486e3c55"><span data-offset-key="652cead29f1b445494c19e0b486e3c55:0">limitations</span></span></span></a><span key="0662f0ba1bfa4a73a3a238309e4dc3cc"><span offset-key="0662f0ba1bfa4a73a3a238309e4dc3cc:0">.</span></span>

> <span key="7f5bc0b8dd884d3bb2ad50d881b11c12"><span offset-key="7f5bc0b8dd884d3bb2ad50d881b11c12:0">If you try to send a request and it isn't successful because the agent is not selected, you will see a link in the response area which you can select to switch to the agent and try your request again. Read </span></span><a href="https://blog.postman.com/introducing-the-postman-agent-send-api-requests-from-your-browser-without-limits/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bbe57fd5a6ed4df89455daf401e083ae" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d5d060c79e49427c99bd3455628b8001"><span data-offset-key="d5d060c79e49427c99bd3455628b8001:0">more about the agent</span></span></span></a><span key="64aeaa637aaa4dbca8e524659e923500"><span offset-key="64aeaa637aaa4dbca8e524659e923500:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="83b4c25d81a3458f8a6df6c32711b332"><span offset-key="83b4c25d81a3458f8a6df6c32711b332:0">Web limitations</span></span>

<span key="0a22bc9f3cab49228afdd7f4e24c630b"><span offset-key="0a22bc9f3cab49228afdd7f4e24c630b:0">Postman on the web is under active development, but there are a few features you can currently only access in the desktop app and not in your web browser:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="8ae15f3937f2411b983abef6f9f06754">**Live preview**<span offset-key="8ae15f3937f2411b983abef6f9f06754:1">: You will not see all of your request headers update live as you enter your request configurations as you do in the desktop Postman app—you will only see Authorization headers update as you edit.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="814513e0244a40f0af5a5ef17afafada">**Saving responses to file**</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="b7fc41597c084739849817f11ee5a248">**Certificates and Proxy**<span offset-key="b7fc41597c084739849817f11ee5a248:1">: These will take the browser defined value and cannot be overridden by Postman.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="e7086675c39f409da5218a539aaad44d">**Postman Interceptor**</span>

## 

<span key="6a475e8aad0c4a388c79b4ee6383a03c"><span offset-key="6a475e8aad0c4a388c79b4ee6383a03c:0">Updating Postman</span></span>

<span key="a3542f05c86c47ff96abe21c640c04f0"><span offset-key="a3542f05c86c47ff96abe21c640c04f0:0">The native Postman apps will notify you when a major update is available. For other updates you will see a dot on the settings icon. If the indicator is red instead of orange, it indicates a failed update.</span></span>

<span key="803ca4f6b1324fc59578f42e2188db61"><span offset-key="803ca4f6b1324fc59578f42e2188db61:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/0dfa85a0de853542ed3bd9239eef91b86e234d721618847a7ff42c878afb73c4/68747470733a2f2f6173736574732e706f73746d616e2e636f6d2f706f73746d616e2d646f63732f7570646174652d72656164792d7638362e6a7067" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="850823ba866b4a8687b243cd27aff39a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="1ad7bcd5c61c45a480583f15a552c85a"><span data-offset-key="1ad7bcd5c61c45a480583f15a552c85a:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="d57b03a7cd4f422cbfc672d9df404072"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="6ea573da8f77440d9fa71557e1b5f842"><span offset-key="6ea573da8f77440d9fa71557e1b5f842:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="5b53def4bba34d5f95898b9a7e0cdda7"><span offset-key="5b53def4bba34d5f95898b9a7e0cdda7:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="e16cb0efa47d4335847007d524e263e2"><span offset-key="e16cb0efa47d4335847007d524e263e2:0">Select the update option to download or install the latest update. You will see a notification when the download is complete, prompting you to restart the Postman app to apply the updates. If you're not ready to update yet, choose </span>**Later**<span offset-key="e16cb0efa47d4335847007d524e263e2:2"> to auto-update the next time you launch the app.</span></span>

<span key="9fe46f93d2af4a15ad60f86deececaf3"><span offset-key="9fe46f93d2af4a15ad60f86deececaf3:0">You can configure your preferences to enable automatic download for major updates in </span>**Settings**<span offset-key="9fe46f93d2af4a15ad60f86deececaf3:2"> &gt; </span>**Update**<span offset-key="9fe46f93d2af4a15ad60f86deececaf3:4">. Postman automatically downloads minor updates and bug fixes.</span></span>

<span key="ce4a0602d9aa40d3a60fd42c033dd3a3"><span offset-key="ce4a0602d9aa40d3a60fd42c033dd3a3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e3807575d8cc4f0288d36ec2d226530b07ff0509cb07d767d9f6054f00d67356/68747470733a2f2f6173736574732e706f73746d616e2e636f6d2f706f73746d616e2d646f63732f73657474696e67732d757064617465732d7638362e6a7067" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ac6bc66f92b04f7b967cdb30404f9f9a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="8293a1b13cab478cbc129d5f2b3ed357"><span data-offset-key="8293a1b13cab478cbc129d5f2b3ed357:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="265e22f11dbc4b96a9ff5c8259c69266"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="cf30d6af4bb443e98c36403e137cd906"><span offset-key="cf30d6af4bb443e98c36403e137cd906:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="129b33945b4246b6b1d7b51e5d94277f"><span offset-key="129b33945b4246b6b1d7b51e5d94277f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="be767209dc6c47889164b39d4d00558d"><span offset-key="be767209dc6c47889164b39d4d00558d:0">Postman Chrome app (deprecated)</span></span>

<span key="829e09701961486cbbfba92d79d12877"><span offset-key="829e09701961486cbbfba92d79d12877:0">The Postman Chrome app is deprecated—if you're using the Chrome app, you can </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/src/pages/docs/getting-started/installation-and-updates.md#migrating-to-the-native-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="900bf4bd0ca54a0eacc0539feee0edb9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="1bad08b3d9c843bfbe31f102e5e0abee"><span data-offset-key="1bad08b3d9c843bfbe31f102e5e0abee:0">retain your data when you switch to the native app</span></span></span></a><span key="8ae4c36067f7456ba70b637db4691cfa"><span offset-key="8ae4c36067f7456ba70b637db4691cfa:0"> either by syncing with a Postman account you're signed into, or by exporting from Chrome and importing into the native app.</span></span>

<span key="b03fe9e3351849b2b73a69ad864db8e9"><span offset-key="b03fe9e3351849b2b73a69ad864db8e9:0">The native app is built on </span></span><a href="https://www.electronjs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="562ff3577d074e5589b4a2157de084fc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="5dc22f7120ee48bdb8268dcb91a2e70f"><span data-offset-key="5dc22f7120ee48bdb8268dcb91a2e70f:0">Electron</span></span></span></a><span key="cc70294942154396bb2a6df1f2e8ade7"><span offset-key="cc70294942154396bb2a6df1f2e8ade7:0">, and </span></span><a href="https://blog.postman.com/going-native/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="895f5b83550c4bae9e08dc30f4c56404" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="34c98f2fe043449c98eb80c30eafc9a1"><span data-offset-key="34c98f2fe043449c98eb80c30eafc9a1:0">overcomes a number of restrictions</span></span></span></a><span key="8a4d09d593b1457da7bc5cd60ed99e1b"><span offset-key="8a4d09d593b1457da7bc5cd60ed99e1b:0"> of the Chrome platform.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="c26adfa0666a4d4780cb2c230676f2ae"><span offset-key="c26adfa0666a4d4780cb2c230676f2ae:0">The native apps let you work with </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/sending-requests/cookies" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1b5aa76d77ec4953a8535e85a4908a8b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="81fe8cd0f670424db9da7d0a8855478b"><span data-offset-key="81fe8cd0f670424db9da7d0a8855478b:0">cookies</span></span></span></a><span key="677dab0c9ba04128b893e6d968e73f0f"><span offset-key="677dab0c9ba04128b893e6d968e73f0f:0"> directly.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="ee4980832da04e079305b7a1819574bc"><span offset-key="ee4980832da04e079305b7a1819574bc:0">Unlike the Chrome app, no separate extension for the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/sending-requests/capturing-request-data/interceptor" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2b7e2057e64847c0b96512a688d54d96" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="fa768534f05a4ec4b75ec966918f36cf"><span data-offset-key="fa768534f05a4ec4b75ec966918f36cf:0">Interceptor</span></span></span></a><span key="17f587bb90fb42e784f5283584370083"><span offset-key="17f587bb90fb42e784f5283584370083:0"> is needed.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="96c80f9566154daca27423a742859283"><span offset-key="96c80f9566154daca27423a742859283:0">The native apps come with a built-in proxy that you can use to </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/sending-requests/capturing-request-data/capturing-http-requests" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9ef2cb72e0b74cc1896c819ae2f76d38" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="e63d2fd9f19f4c569d269e26c48cd07c"><span data-offset-key="e63d2fd9f19f4c569d269e26c48cd07c:0">capture network traffic</span></span></span></a><span key="52cd281e1c244987b36225faefbc6ad6"><span offset-key="52cd281e1c244987b36225faefbc6ad6:0">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="41dd6f997f0d4834aa8c459f47a62f91"><span offset-key="41dd6f997f0d4834aa8c459f47a62f91:0">The native apps are not restricted by the Chrome standards for the menu bar. You can check for updates, create Postman Windows and tabs, and edit preferences.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="fb2f755356de4a0b811ec016020e887f"><span offset-key="fb2f755356de4a0b811ec016020e887f:0">The native apps let you send headers like </span>`Origin`<span offset-key="fb2f755356de4a0b811ec016020e887f:2"> and </span>`User-Agent`<span offset-key="fb2f755356de4a0b811ec016020e887f:4">. These are restricted in the Chrome app.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="5627e041f1574e8e976e29d037453657"><span offset-key="5627e041f1574e8e976e29d037453657:0">The "don't follow redirects" option exists in the native apps to prevent requests that return a 300-series response from being automatically redirected—doing this in the Chrome app requires the Interceptor extension.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="5f8e31ea858e4ea2b1f574f18f64af53"><span offset-key="5f8e31ea858e4ea2b1f574f18f64af53:0">The native app has a built-in </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/sending-requests/troubleshooting-api-requests" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5258dffd6836476195444fcfd94d7980" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="4968268f256a4bc3808669562c9a06d7"><span data-offset-key="4968268f256a4bc3808669562c9a06d7:0">console</span></span></span></a><span key="097d31f0657449d2933dea9e8d6622e7"><span offset-key="097d31f0657449d2933dea9e8d6622e7:0">, which allows you to view the network request details for API calls.</span></span>

### 

<span key="580b17a0a267404c9e64066134553828"><span offset-key="580b17a0a267404c9e64066134553828:0">Migrating to the native app</span></span>

<span key="9cd03efbfb3045b5b6739998dbf1cb21"><span offset-key="9cd03efbfb3045b5b6739998dbf1cb21:0">To switch from the Chrome app to native, </span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="55f1673660324e13bc4e5b262c53a9f4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="15b960f0fe554eacad41c2fafcacdc32"><span data-offset-key="15b960f0fe554eacad41c2fafcacdc32:0">download</span></span></span></a><span key="967d7f7d9b1345d786ff0105abe86949"><span offset-key="967d7f7d9b1345d786ff0105abe86949:0"> Postman and </span></span><a href="https://go.postman.co" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a1689be99b9e4d67b7468898d1dc8380" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="7ba0e290507949eeb2aae5c6bf8450d1"><span data-offset-key="7ba0e290507949eeb2aae5c6bf8450d1:0">sign in to your account</span></span></span></a><span key="14bf5f3514a94e74ac55936bbbb39a8b"><span offset-key="14bf5f3514a94e74ac55936bbbb39a8b:0">. Start the native app, and your history and collections will be automatically synced.</span></span>

<span key="838f430af2d1438ea9b03e284eb868e9"><span offset-key="838f430af2d1438ea9b03e284eb868e9:0">Alternatively, if you don't want to sign in to your Postman account, you can bulk export your Postman data from the Chrome app, and then bulk import into the new native app at </span>**Settings**<span offset-key="838f430af2d1438ea9b03e284eb868e9:2"> &gt; </span>**Data**<span offset-key="838f430af2d1438ea9b03e284eb868e9:4">.</span></span>

<span key="cd21d4c88ae8481281c744f6b69c141f"><span offset-key="cd21d4c88ae8481281c744f6b69c141f:0">Import Export Data</span></span>

> <span key="2758d8b4cfe4402bb564a288848fa15b"><span offset-key="2758d8b4cfe4402bb564a288848fa15b:0">Note that importing will overwrite your existing data. For more on bulk import, see </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/getting-started/importing-and-exporting-data" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8be591e23b5f440f9380d26a5aadf053" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="6a428f3162b7498d911527c6dce7e8ae"><span data-offset-key="6a428f3162b7498d911527c6dce7e8ae:0">Importing Postman data</span></span></span></a><span key="a0bde60d6026498d963479aab7c6823e"><span offset-key="a0bde60d6026498d963479aab7c6823e:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="c367baf486b943c6a77e7e88a8b0ca6c"><span offset-key="c367baf486b943c6a77e7e88a8b0ca6c:0">Using Postman behind a firewall</span></span>

<span key="d661651ffe894a08b84ab77fc886cb19"><span offset-key="d661651ffe894a08b84ab77fc886cb19:0">Postman's infrastructure runs on Amazon's AWS platform. If you are operating behind a network firewall, you will need to allow the following domains to make WebSocket connections for Postman:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="4205991e9e6e482d921f239da70c4697">`\*.getpostman.com`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="c626f57a75fb469db568e347254857d9">`\*.postman.co`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="685a1170ebcd4a89a6ad4f99080c0949">`\*.pstmn.io`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="2e41093feeae47ee8625cc3e9ed16892">`\*postman.com`</span>

<span key="a5dac16966f24670bfdc116ff3c9dce2"><span offset-key="a5dac16966f24670bfdc116ff3c9dce2:0">By default, WebSocket connections use the same ports as HTTP (80) and HTTPS (443).</span></span>

<span key="36f7af34ca2e4ddbb115ead907f84151"><span offset-key="36f7af34ca2e4ddbb115ead907f84151:0">Postman does not have a fixed IP range that can be provided. If necessary, please refer to the </span></span><a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws-ip-ranges.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d951c2626b234049975b817d2b6c29a3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="4bd30948c8144167a024fbaae5daa583"><span data-offset-key="4bd30948c8144167a024fbaae5daa583:0">current AWS IP ranges</span></span></span></a><span key="5173d46a26214a4babbd7089ae905326"><span offset-key="5173d46a26214a4babbd7089ae905326:0"> and allow the broad range provided.</span></span>

## 

<span key="66922e639a4143839333662542007840"><span offset-key="66922e639a4143839333662542007840:0">Troubleshooting your Postman installation</span></span>

<span key="79f7581890714be99fa5fbb368d013ec"><span offset-key="79f7581890714be99fa5fbb368d013ec:0">If you encounter any issues installing and running Postman, check out the following tips. If these do not help, please refer to the installation posts on the </span></span><a href="https://community.postman.com/tags/installation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="92a03f8e6d884281aff44f7a104d726f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="3e7ad2c7f94445328ef80726681d0a85"><span data-offset-key="3e7ad2c7f94445328ef80726681d0a85:0">community forum</span></span></span></a><span key="8d27de22ed294e1f97dd27fda09061a0"><span offset-key="8d27de22ed294e1f97dd27fda09061a0:0"> and create a new post if your issue is not already covered.</span></span>

### 

<span key="43c54884b1a74bd8825b26fadf06afae"><span offset-key="43c54884b1a74bd8825b26fadf06afae:0">Update failed error</span></span>

<span key="338eca8a4b8c4d9997ec769c724e1df3"><span offset-key="338eca8a4b8c4d9997ec769c724e1df3:0">If you see an </span>**Update Failed**<span offset-key="338eca8a4b8c4d9997ec769c724e1df3:2"> notification in Postman, you can use the DevTools to investigate.</span></span>

<span key="229054b67bcd4df0aa53d1fa9b56101c"><span offset-key="229054b67bcd4df0aa53d1fa9b56101c:0">update-error-dialog</span></span>

<span key="d4c2264f3f384f4db15ce64ad68c28b0"><span offset-key="d4c2264f3f384f4db15ce64ad68c28b0:0">Open the DevTools using </span>**View**<span offset-key="d4c2264f3f384f4db15ce64ad68c28b0:2"> &gt; </span>**Developer**<span offset-key="d4c2264f3f384f4db15ce64ad68c28b0:4"> &gt; </span>**Show DevTools (Current View)**<span offset-key="d4c2264f3f384f4db15ce64ad68c28b0:6">. Some known errors are as follows:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="271ace0a730e478e802d2da90a170b4d">**Error message:**<span offset-key="271ace0a730e478e802d2da90a170b4d:1"> </span>`Cannot update while running on                                                 a read-only volume`</span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

        <span key="39c93ce99a8848c0a3121e432c2978d2"><span offset-key="39c93ce99a8848c0a3121e432c2978d2:0">This error means that the app user does not have write permission in the directory where Postman is installed. To resolve the problem, move Postman to a directory where the user has write permissions, for example the </span>`/Application`<span offset-key="39c93ce99a8848c0a3121e432c2978d2:2"> directory for Mac, and to the </span>`home`<span offset-key="39c93ce99a8848c0a3121e432c2978d2:4"> directory for Linux.</span></span>

<span key="ad0dea4ca373446a899e600d9cd91f5b"><span offset-key="ad0dea4ca373446a899e600d9cd91f5b:0">Write Permission Issue in DevTools</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="a910d950f18041ec931e12b541cdaacc">**Error message:**<span offset-key="a910d950f18041ec931e12b541cdaacc:1"> </span>`Code signature at URL                                                 file:///... did not pass                                                 validation: code object is not                                                 signed at all`</span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

        <span key="3e9e512d23ed4e948291520fb0d9e227"><span offset-key="3e9e512d23ed4e948291520fb0d9e227:0">This error means that there are multiple updates running at the same time. This can happen when the app is opened before the previous update could finish. To resolve the problem, quit and reopen the app.</span></span>

<span key="e1d280aee59b4d15a27eedc26e33bee2"><span offset-key="e1d280aee59b4d15a27eedc26e33bee2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c5e998ba8d4ab426b6beb383a06c11e362701b841e0ec649c1aec7b8c3092c51/68747470733a2f2f6173736574732e706f73746d616e2e636f6d2f706f73746d616e2d646f63732f6d756c7469706c652d757064617465732d72756e6e696e672e706e67" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2e058bd0534843459f86044a51c08baf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="4fd885e68ac14a0cb4d8ca9ac34bc7b1"><span data-offset-key="4fd885e68ac14a0cb4d8ca9ac34bc7b1:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="3be98ac1e65e4bb895cd7b3134ab6dec"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="a289ebbdd3d347daa4bdfcde3b01fd93"><span offset-key="a289ebbdd3d347daa4bdfcde3b01fd93:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="2511f671a9c04b9d84ee6c5c73ae69e8"><span offset-key="2511f671a9c04b9d84ee6c5c73ae69e8:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="65950bcfb7f64c2486adcf109d184f70"><span offset-key="65950bcfb7f64c2486adcf109d184f70:0">Update button not available</span></span>

<span key="dd56e75a9edd4f6096d18a763d18e18d"><span offset-key="dd56e75a9edd4f6096d18a763d18e18d:0">If you are using Postman for Linux, and installed the app with the Ubuntu Software Center or Snap Store, you may not see a </span>**Check for updates**<span offset-key="dd56e75a9edd4f6096d18a763d18e18d:2"> button. This is because the updates are handled by the store, which should automatically update Postman on a regular cadence.</span></span>

## 

<span key="37a1040d982440d7b1e7e8b0ae4a31b7"><span offset-key="37a1040d982440d7b1e7e8b0ae4a31b7:0">Next steps</span></span>

<span key="bc81f3472dd84ebcaacf6ec9adb28add"><span offset-key="bc81f3472dd84ebcaacf6ec9adb28add:0">If you're having trouble with installation or updates, reach out for </span></span><a href="https://www.postman.com/support" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="43eb9702793344eabe51c551a27fa070" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="f1eb490272e9425686512148c26e627a"><span data-offset-key="f1eb490272e9425686512148c26e627a:0">Postman support</span></span></span></a><span key="74c91461db2d4469b328748c5f3cab91"><span offset-key="74c91461db2d4469b328748c5f3cab91:0">. If your installation is working as expected, </span></span><a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-docs/blob/develop/docs/getting-started/sending-the-first-request" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="57323d489dba4ff69109c7a8d86164eb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="b94ee7544bb74e97b9f79bbdba5e9a1c"><span data-offset-key="b94ee7544bb74e97b9f79bbdba5e9a1c:0">send your first request</span></span></span></a><span key="3c106759518b467f90b24aad557c498f"><span offset-key="3c106759518b467f90b24aad557c498f:0">!</span></span>

# 

<span key="b96eec912ae143abaa2d2f1d33ba2415"><span offset-key="b96eec912ae143abaa2d2f1d33ba2415:0">Postman JavaScript reference</span></span>

<span key="f0e536cb51114c3bb2859da6aa1ab7b1"><span offset-key="f0e536cb51114c3bb2859da6aa1ab7b1:0">Postman provides JavaScript APIs that you can use in your request scripts. The </span>`pm`<span offset-key="f0e536cb51114c3bb2859da6aa1ab7b1:2"> object provides most of the functionality for testing your request and response data, with the </span>`postman`<span offset-key="f0e536cb51114c3bb2859da6aa1ab7b1:4"> object providing some additional workflow control.</span></span>

##

    <span key="f01c0a2d062543d09c4bc440e933b40d"><span offset-key="f01c0a2d062543d09c4bc440e933b40d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#writing-test-assertions" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ea0491f489154245af1c5214b2364e0f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="15be78183cf54f3a9945ef52cd6cf42c"><span data-offset-key="15be78183cf54f3a9945ef52cd6cf42c:0">Writing test assertions</span></span></span></a><span key="05c9ba2e0e75421c83f9f79b67249f9e"><span offset-key="05c9ba2e0e75421c83f9f79b67249f9e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="6b99a91d36274b1f9a654c6e54ad9eda"><span offset-key="6b99a91d36274b1f9a654c6e54ad9eda:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#using-external-libraries" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b4ffd25253fe42e6a33ecd8ded3426a5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="9d87a3149a9843f4bb1bc3c6a5cb40ec"><span data-offset-key="9d87a3149a9843f4bb1bc3c6a5cb40ec:0">Using external libraries</span></span></span></a><span key="ea977711308241d990a2c43fe6964d57"><span offset-key="ea977711308241d990a2c43fe6964d57:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="930e117c5e554f13b5717ad05f2fe5e2"><span offset-key="930e117c5e554f13b5717ad05f2fe5e2:0">The pm object</span></span>

<span key="89cb005961584fd7bff95f4082956c0a"><span offset-key="89cb005961584fd7bff95f4082956c0a:0">You will carry out most of the Postman JavaScript API functionality using </span>`pm.*`<span offset-key="89cb005961584fd7bff95f4082956c0a:2">, which provides access to request and response data, and variables.</span></span>

### 

<span key="a9918c9f848947738c19fdea8ae4a97d"><span offset-key="a9918c9f848947738c19fdea8ae4a97d:0">Using variables in scripts</span></span>

<span key="b100e27109914789a3a81af3d128a245"><span offset-key="b100e27109914789a3a81af3d128a245:0">You can access and manipulate </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/variables/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="18d05d2f2c4c4e41af84960d418bc2c6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="29d9d9c503b04d81b0e799c97811b293"><span data-offset-key="29d9d9c503b04d81b0e799c97811b293:0">variables</span></span></span></a><span key="07fe1a27194c47798fd0f65eed6e23fc"><span offset-key="07fe1a27194c47798fd0f65eed6e23fc:0"> at each scope in Postman using the </span>`pm`<span offset-key="07fe1a27194c47798fd0f65eed6e23fc:2"> API.</span></span>

> <span key="c9fb452e1ce04ae99edc110f650a5df1"><span offset-key="c9fb452e1ce04ae99edc110f650a5df1:0">You can use </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/variables-list/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6368a09d9de84b12baad9d86a04b2634" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="7f73233e4f9649e3b26a6327ca29f8e1"><span data-offset-key="7f73233e4f9649e3b26a6327ca29f8e1:0">dynamic variables</span></span></span></a><span key="743f36e6281c4c0cb13ed1a28715ed2a"><span offset-key="743f36e6281c4c0cb13ed1a28715ed2a:0"> to generate values when your requests run.</span></span>

<span key="6eb873c19c1541df9ab52670004412de"><span offset-key="6eb873c19c1541df9ab52670004412de:0">Postman supports a variety of variable </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/variables/#variable-scopes" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="cbbdfdcb923e4162a08cbdfdadabdfbc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="ecf53ec68088470abd8f6e4aca5f9b62"><span data-offset-key="ecf53ec68088470abd8f6e4aca5f9b62:0">scopes</span></span></span></a><span key="2bca1ff8dd5c4dbea04d748f6b4eace1"><span offset-key="2bca1ff8dd5c4dbea04d748f6b4eace1:0">. The </span>`pm`<span offset-key="2bca1ff8dd5c4dbea04d748f6b4eace1:2"> object provides methods for accessing global, collection, and environment variables specifically, and </span>`pm.variables`<span offset-key="2bca1ff8dd5c4dbea04d748f6b4eace1:4"> methods for accessing variables at different scopes as well as setting local variables.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="e20ed020d1b240a6881e70a301612693"><span offset-key="e20ed020d1b240a6881e70a301612693:0">Check if there is a Postman variable in the current scope:</span></span>

1

<span key="ec83cebf386741e7914e4c041ea0c6b1"><span offset-key="ec83cebf386741e7914e4c041ea0c6b1:0">pm.variables.has(variableName:String):function → Boolean</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="cc2664b066ce471ea94fcf6da24884f6"><span offset-key="cc2664b066ce471ea94fcf6da24884f6:0">Get the value of the Postman variable with the specified name:</span></span>

1

<span key="385878599ac1480393c62a197b089e6c"><span offset-key="385878599ac1480393c62a197b089e6c:0">pm.variables.get(variableName:String):function → \*</span></span>

    <span key="12a72aa338ee4832923c8330cbbe14ee"><span offset-key="12a72aa338ee4832923c8330cbbe14ee:0">Set a local variable with the specified name and value:</span></span>

1

<span key="c0a46733da5240a59d7b562110abe68f"><span offset-key="c0a46733da5240a59d7b562110abe68f:0">pm.variables.set(variableName:String, variableValue:\*):function</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1b2ceb12e27e4ac4a8547a5d12ef38a3"><span offset-key="1b2ceb12e27e4ac4a8547a5d12ef38a3:0">Return the resolved value of a dynamic variable inside a script using the syntax </span>`{{$variableName}}`<span offset-key="1b2ceb12e27e4ac4a8547a5d12ef38a3:2">:</span></span>

1

<span key="bade8059f31342ce81c12e03cfb6b65e"><span offset-key="bade8059f31342ce81c12e03cfb6b65e:0">pm.variables.replaceIn(variableName:String):function: → \*</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

> <span key="6ed5beaae3624482b53e22ecc48d7ca9"><span offset-key="6ed5beaae3624482b53e22ecc48d7ca9:0">For example:</span></span>

<span key="be48a9e96b0b4a2ebcf0b5cf70e0cd2f"><span offset-key="be48a9e96b0b4a2ebcf0b5cf70e0cd2f:0">const stringWithVars = pm.variables.replaceIn("Hi, my name is {{$randomFirstName}}");</span></span>

2

<span key="64c371dddd2947cb8f76c05876580116"><span offset-key="64c371dddd2947cb8f76c05876580116:0">console.log(stringWithVars);</span></span>

    <span key="306d041eeca941acb89f5ac2375765da"><span offset-key="306d041eeca941acb89f5ac2375765da:0">Return an object containing all variables with their values in the current scope. Based on the order of precedence, this will contain variables from multiple scopes.</span></span>

1

<span key="b8b0d7b543004dfd8410573313f7c9bc"><span offset-key="b8b0d7b543004dfd8410573313f7c9bc:0">pm.variables.toObject():function → Object</span></span>

<span key="435a8617451a4993822f054de5722f22"><span offset-key="435a8617451a4993822f054de5722f22:0">Variable scope determines the precedence Postman gives to variables when you reference them, in order of increasing precedence:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="d77d0d3d61464c74981978af18337a62"><span offset-key="d77d0d3d61464c74981978af18337a62:0">Global</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="99bff958e951492ab0b888651a73a18a"><span offset-key="99bff958e951492ab0b888651a73a18a:0">Environment</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="ba5bfe60ac8a4a93bfedd41756467888"><span offset-key="ba5bfe60ac8a4a93bfedd41756467888:0">Collection</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="79f395860dcb44c7bd2c99e059ee068a"><span offset-key="79f395860dcb44c7bd2c99e059ee068a:0">Data</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="047d4c02857440f98c4fdcaafd9f8241"><span offset-key="047d4c02857440f98c4fdcaafd9f8241:0">Local</span></span>

<span key="b8cdbbe3e0544c9d854ba5fdec9de76c"><span offset-key="b8cdbbe3e0544c9d854ba5fdec9de76c:0">The variable with the closest scope overrides any others. For example, if you have variables named </span>`score`<span offset-key="b8cdbbe3e0544c9d854ba5fdec9de76c:2"> in both the current collection and the active environment, and you call </span>`pm.variables.get('score')`<span offset-key="b8cdbbe3e0544c9d854ba5fdec9de76c:4">, Postman will return the current value of the environment variable. When you set a variable value using </span>`pm.variables.set`<span offset-key="b8cdbbe3e0544c9d854ba5fdec9de76c:6">, the value is local and will only persist for the current request or collection run.</span></span>

1

<span key="fcb082fba9644a3fa3ec3eb11dd5b23e"><span offset-key="fcb082fba9644a3fa3ec3eb11dd5b23e:0">//collection var 'score' = 1</span></span>

2

<span key="7bcfd9e6922f4eaeb7c85922a20a39d5"><span offset-key="7bcfd9e6922f4eaeb7c85922a20a39d5:0">//environment var 'score' = 2</span></span>

3

<span key="480de5d30e194969ad8798dff64b39ad"><span offset-key="480de5d30e194969ad8798dff64b39ad:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

4

<span key="dce4990644f04c289b98e18e26d40b56"><span offset-key="dce4990644f04c289b98e18e26d40b56:0">//first request run</span></span>

5

<span key="159553abaf7d473ba912366fcedaaf3c"><span offset-key="159553abaf7d473ba912366fcedaaf3c:0">console.log(pm.variables.get('score'));//outputs 2</span></span>

6

<span key="0f361e4703b7493a8fce03712a52eb44"><span offset-key="0f361e4703b7493a8fce03712a52eb44:0">console.log(pm.collectionVariables.get('score'));//outputs 1</span></span>

7

<span key="cd79f74c14ea46158d412e19d746b1c1"><span offset-key="cd79f74c14ea46158d412e19d746b1c1:0">console.log(pm.environment.get('score'));//outputs 2</span></span>

8

<span key="de55cc6bfdec423baf30fbf539403035"><span offset-key="de55cc6bfdec423baf30fbf539403035:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

9

<span key="b1a39a679c694a7bb3002421284cae28"><span offset-key="b1a39a679c694a7bb3002421284cae28:0">//second request run</span></span>

10

<span key="5f19e2ee2c0c4ef8a3a43fc9765058d4"><span offset-key="5f19e2ee2c0c4ef8a3a43fc9765058d4:0">pm.variables.set('score', 3);//local var</span></span>

11

<span key="129d7c360e164073a81c3826a58e83f3"><span offset-key="129d7c360e164073a81c3826a58e83f3:0">console.log(pm.variables.get('score'));//outputs 3</span></span>

12

<span key="9d80de0899b648429ae5fc2cf1c186a8"><span offset-key="9d80de0899b648429ae5fc2cf1c186a8:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

<span key="57115d0e8aef4494b3580d200f1dcf66"><span offset-key="57115d0e8aef4494b3580d200f1dcf66:0">//third request run</span></span>

14

<span key="76b218b5d261447a985323c7cf0bc1dd"><span offset-key="76b218b5d261447a985323c7cf0bc1dd:0">console.log(pm.variables.get('score'));//outputs 2</span></span>

> <span key="e43f716a1de64560b0eee6fc2966a86b"><span offset-key="e43f716a1de64560b0eee6fc2966a86b:0">See the </span></span><a href="https://www.postmanlabs.com/postman-collection/Variable.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9c35a09df8f643a0b436cd6dd3b582eb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="c9a9018aaf9d476fa3d19ecb68423399"><span data-offset-key="c9a9018aaf9d476fa3d19ecb68423399:0">Postman Collection SDK Variables reference</span></span></span></a><span key="69ade6ebc214425e8b859cf6ff095552"><span offset-key="69ade6ebc214425e8b859cf6ff095552:0"> for more detail.</span></span>

<span key="786fcaae6df54a8da0b926a377e56e37"><span offset-key="786fcaae6df54a8da0b926a377e56e37:0">You can also access variables defined in the individual scopes via </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#using-environment-variables-in-scripts" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="838629f3acdf451b8029da932849d687" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="34c89e0f5b424c53884fddce55a75612"><span data-offset-key="34c89e0f5b424c53884fddce55a75612:0">pm.environment</span></span></span></a><span key="3fafb320532e4da2a45329a3c6b0d425"><span offset-key="3fafb320532e4da2a45329a3c6b0d425:0">, </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#using-collection-variables-in-scripts" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2e3b28d35a9448aa9e3742da48ea9279" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="a55b8b21225f401e97578d999bfb4fa0"><span data-offset-key="a55b8b21225f401e97578d999bfb4fa0:0">pm.collectionVariables</span></span></span></a><span key="57fb5d6ae8b04949b20243cdc038b522"><span offset-key="57fb5d6ae8b04949b20243cdc038b522:0">, and </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#using-global-variables-in-scripts" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b53bd42273504eeab5322f692a4a8bba" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="844198b8d1154c0c890e7b8dc105be0d"><span data-offset-key="844198b8d1154c0c890e7b8dc105be0d:0">pm.globals</span></span></span></a><span key="c1ea224efa4a45ad91be4ccd4ca0c034"><span offset-key="c1ea224efa4a45ad91be4ccd4ca0c034:0">.</span></span>

<span key="b97340374fb848b5bd760ee29e836ae3">**Using environment variables in scripts**</span>

<span key="2fca48e4ad8441eea5a9f5ab81b25547"><span offset-key="2fca48e4ad8441eea5a9f5ab81b25547:0">Your scripts can use the </span>`pm.environment`<span offset-key="2fca48e4ad8441eea5a9f5ab81b25547:2"> methods to access and manipulate variables in the active (currently selected) environment.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="ef52dd82815440a5ad70cc7bba81cf8d"><span offset-key="ef52dd82815440a5ad70cc7bba81cf8d:0">The name of the active environment:</span></span>

1

<span key="d9b88089cefc4463aa21b1926f8edfb9"><span offset-key="d9b88089cefc4463aa21b1926f8edfb9:0">pm.environment.name:String</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

    <span key="d831370ea5c142d4b489848e4f3b58bb"><span offset-key="d831370ea5c142d4b489848e4f3b58bb:0">Check whether the environment has a variable with the specified name:</span></span>

1

<span key="c2afb9ac8b3f4e8196cdb81d6a66b400"><span offset-key="c2afb9ac8b3f4e8196cdb81d6a66b400:0">pm.environment.has(variableName:String):function → Boolean</span></span>

    <span key="f6a40bd34cd148b38cbdc3c3de1808db"><span offset-key="f6a40bd34cd148b38cbdc3c3de1808db:0">Get the variable with the specified name in the active environment:</span></span>

    <span key="803f8575af0e44beab59713ffee94b3a"><span offset-key="803f8575af0e44beab59713ffee94b3a:0">Return the resolved value of a dynamic variable inside a script using the syntax </span>`{{$variableName}}`<span offset-key="803f8575af0e44beab59713ffee94b3a:2">:</span></span>

1

<span key="b3c05fc27c6b44459724051314963850"><span offset-key="b3c05fc27c6b44459724051314963850:0">pm.environment.replaceIn(variableName:String):function → \*</span></span>

> <span key="e705af9945cc4dbdabb93a640c023971"><span offset-key="e705af9945cc4dbdabb93a640c023971:0">For example:</span></span>

1

<span key="151604b5a402441d8e48846b979f7925"><span offset-key="151604b5a402441d8e48846b979f7925:0">//environment has vars firstName and age</span></span>

2
