### 

<span key="214211ade85e40dd8ea30ec6aa0efbe4"><span offset-key="214211ade85e40dd8ea30ec6aa0efbe4:0">Scripting with request and response data</span></span>

<span key="1a0665e1a3ee4d61b63decff5ae6e47d"><span offset-key="1a0665e1a3ee4d61b63decff5ae6e47d:0">A variety of methods provide access to request and response data in Postman scripts, including </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#scripting-with-request-data" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ff78ef6ceb854128824c288dbd079355" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="0667f3d59f714cf39ebbbf277167d1a0"><span data-offset-key="0667f3d59f714cf39ebbbf277167d1a0:0">pm.request</span></span></span></a><span key="6395654d363a484384655ad6cb157684"><span offset-key="6395654d363a484384655ad6cb157684:0">, </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#scripting-with-response-data" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1a15b944e0be41d2993359e6b547c6bc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="91f52a8ca75a4c338e7c8ea9278eb420"><span data-offset-key="91f52a8ca75a4c338e7c8ea9278eb420:0">pm.response</span></span></span></a><span key="d91475b8119a4792a6048aa371fbeb4d"><span offset-key="d91475b8119a4792a6048aa371fbeb4d:0">, </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#scripting-with-request-info" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a4924cd319e54097837fe1713baf3731" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="e90041ed53334dfe892fe6223e4e62fb"><span data-offset-key="e90041ed53334dfe892fe6223e4e62fb:0">pm.info</span></span></span></a><span key="da4a3d3893994aeb85c8fb495038836d"><span offset-key="da4a3d3893994aeb85c8fb495038836d:0">, and </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#scripting-with-request-cookies" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a78965d31b0442bebb3ddec6f760e39a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="40110d4fd4f246728f85be291221dae1"><span data-offset-key="40110d4fd4f246728f85be291221dae1:0">pm.cookies</span></span></span></a><span key="a8f8990ff12c4bc58550c2919b12980a"><span offset-key="a8f8990ff12c4bc58550c2919b12980a:0">. Additionally you can send requests using </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#sending-requests-from-scripts" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9a0308488da6429cbf552680a49ffce3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="34f2054eb41d4bbc8459737116ea789b"><span data-offset-key="34f2054eb41d4bbc8459737116ea789b:0">pm.sendRequest</span></span></span></a><span key="e70565a337af4743b7676286e9e63b3f"><span offset-key="e70565a337af4743b7676286e9e63b3f:0">.</span></span>

<span key="37e40cd4bac742aeb586308060dbea02">**Scripting with request data**</span>

<span key="9161de1914ad4f5f80e2a77b4a2d5d4a"><span offset-key="9161de1914ad4f5f80e2a77b4a2d5d4a:0">The </span>`pm.request`<span offset-key="9161de1914ad4f5f80e2a77b4a2d5d4a:2"> object provides access to the data for the request the script is running within. For a </span>**Pre-request Script**<span offset-key="9161de1914ad4f5f80e2a77b4a2d5d4a:4"> this is the request that is about to run, and for a </span>**Test**<span offset-key="9161de1914ad4f5f80e2a77b4a2d5d4a:6"> script this is the request that has already run.</span></span>

<span key="49ba146d3a7b4b33a9b638dc9c0f2514"><span offset-key="49ba146d3a7b4b33a9b638dc9c0f2514:0">You can use the </span>`pm.request`<span offset-key="49ba146d3a7b4b33a9b638dc9c0f2514:2"> object pre-request scripts to alter various parts of the request configuration before it runs.</span></span>

<span key="8ae8cff995a1467c83b057d56498bcb3"><span offset-key="8ae8cff995a1467c83b057d56498bcb3:0">The </span>`pm.request`<span offset-key="8ae8cff995a1467c83b057d56498bcb3:2"> object provides the following properties and methods:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="e8c00f3a6e7f4f86804fbcc39c2ad0f6"><span offset-key="e8c00f3a6e7f4f86804fbcc39c2ad0f6:0">The request URL:</span></span>

1

<span key="964de598c1d54fc99ff9e5a8d7f1a51c"><span offset-key="964de598c1d54fc99ff9e5a8d7f1a51c:0">pm.request.url:Url</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="751ee633ee574001ba29743fa006fe45"><span offset-key="751ee633ee574001ba29743fa006fe45:0">The </span></span><a href="https://www.postmanlabs.com/postman-collection/HeaderList.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f649ca83504b4993b29b3f1ba54bc096" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="ed5a1bd379734d69b5acf4b41a4a2375"><span data-offset-key="ed5a1bd379734d69b5acf4b41a4a2375:0">list of headers</span></span></span></a><span key="c04906caec094a52a9f80ac8d25f52f7"><span offset-key="c04906caec094a52a9f80ac8d25f52f7:0"> for the current request:</span></span>

1

<span key="9dff786b7a9c4d4aba2c696109d23215"><span offset-key="9dff786b7a9c4d4aba2c696109d23215:0">pm.request.headers:HeaderList</span></span>

    <span key="a4f096f1b875493b8ddf0b98c6f177a9"><span offset-key="a4f096f1b875493b8ddf0b98c6f177a9:0">The HTTP request method:</span></span>

1

<span key="82c38c1b07bb4fe8bf55d36b388a0245"><span offset-key="82c38c1b07bb4fe8bf55d36b388a0245:0">pm.request.method:String</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="5e3eba367ce34812b37243c1a965c129"><span offset-key="5e3eba367ce34812b37243c1a965c129:0">The data in the </span></span><a href="https://www.postmanlabs.com/postman-collection/RequestBody.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0e718c905c5c4df28387ce863c2cae04" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="012b6a20745144cc802c9723604977c7"><span data-offset-key="012b6a20745144cc802c9723604977c7:0">request body</span></span></span></a><span key="c9bae518786b4383bbf9f1a99174d793"><span offset-key="c9bae518786b4383bbf9f1a99174d793:0">. This object is immutable and cannot be modified from scripts:</span></span>

1

<span key="3a4830f95e5a4241997dea2a736609a0"><span offset-key="3a4830f95e5a4241997dea2a736609a0:0">pm.request.body:RequestBody</span></span>

    <span key="2cf3f140ee9145ceabf46288915bf8bc"><span offset-key="2cf3f140ee9145ceabf46288915bf8bc:0">Add a header with the specified name and value for the current request:</span></span>

1

<span key="637e71c8831e44fdbfff705c233bfb0e"><span offset-key="637e71c8831e44fdbfff705c233bfb0e:0">pm.request.headers.add(header:Header):function</span></span>

2

<span key="9dd4eaf349044bbcabedc5cd8d6a8b7b">**Scripting with response data**</span>

<span key="43661b5611164310a9872769f7f9e919"><span offset-key="43661b5611164310a9872769f7f9e919:0">The </span>`pm.response`<span offset-key="43661b5611164310a9872769f7f9e919:2"> object provides access to the data returned in the response for the current request in scripts added to the </span>**Tests**<span offset-key="43661b5611164310a9872769f7f9e919:4">.</span></span>

<span key="fea06cb4a73b46bc868ae9efdb4fe14f"><span offset-key="fea06cb4a73b46bc868ae9efdb4fe14f:0">The </span>`pm.response`<span offset-key="fea06cb4a73b46bc868ae9efdb4fe14f:2"> object provides the following properties and methods:</span></span>

    <span key="bb76921b0c78420b9a08bbac26eb8747"><span offset-key="bb76921b0c78420b9a08bbac26eb8747:0">The response status code:</span></span>

<span key="af9c0d9ffd8a43c5a43d5c6c58867988">**Scripting with request info**</span>

<span key="c1f58cbbc644483bb9b2754422c3f47e"><span offset-key="c1f58cbbc644483bb9b2754422c3f47e:0">The </span>`pm.info`<span offset-key="c1f58cbbc644483bb9b2754422c3f47e:2"> object provides data related to the request and the script itself, including name, ID, and iteration count.</span></span>

<span key="7f90a33dd3b04b6cb4e39e2895c6bf7c"><span offset-key="7f90a33dd3b04b6cb4e39e2895c6bf7c:0">The </span>`pm.info`<span offset-key="7f90a33dd3b04b6cb4e39e2895c6bf7c:2"> object provides the following properties and methods:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="f22970d9106e4aa180a147380de94c3a"><span offset-key="f22970d9106e4aa180a147380de94c3a:0">The event, which will be either "prerequest" or "test" depending on where the script is executing within the request:</span></span>

1

<span key="9b3f5aba796f4e3db6e7659b2a537519"><span offset-key="9b3f5aba796f4e3db6e7659b2a537519:0">pm.info.eventName:String</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

    <span key="31eb5bd5701b4238a594cc7c2ac53a50"><span offset-key="31eb5bd5701b4238a594cc7c2ac53a50:0">The value of the current </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/running-collections/intro-to-collection-runs/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bf0e333db291495eb859972663c03667" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="81670dd729e74fbc8b4a284aa97aebca"><span data-offset-key="81670dd729e74fbc8b4a284aa97aebca:0">iteration</span></span></span></a><span key="b368c24ab1d6446a81ee88b77d2c734b"><span offset-key="b368c24ab1d6446a81ee88b77d2c734b:0">:</span></span>

1

<span key="b4e3a5b72c5b420d83fa26ac3fe91a84"><span offset-key="b4e3a5b72c5b420d83fa26ac3fe91a84:0">pm.info.iteration:Number</span></span>

<span key="98352118333f43c1b0b4326fd3c17e09">**Scripting with request cookies**</span>

<span key="0b42b049b7e84c858b022ed6103e1aa5"><span offset-key="0b42b049b7e84c858b022ed6103e1aa5:0">The </span>`pm.cookies`<span offset-key="0b42b049b7e84c858b022ed6103e1aa5:2"> object provides access to the list of cookies associated with the request.</span></span>

<span key="fe4659fea96047dba6b7b2d8a5144519"><span offset-key="fe4659fea96047dba6b7b2d8a5144519:0">The </span>`pm.cookies`<span offset-key="fe4659fea96047dba6b7b2d8a5144519:2"> object provides the following properties and methods:</span></span>

1

<span key="e1f279b9c9174ea785cbf34bc2729f98"><span offset-key="e1f279b9c9174ea785cbf34bc2729f98:0">pm.cookies.has(cookieName:String):Function → Boolean</span></span>

<span key="df5daba09330464796e436191fdccc77"><span offset-key="df5daba09330464796e436191fdccc77:0">You can also use </span>`pm.cookies.jar`<span offset-key="df5daba09330464796e436191fdccc77:2"> to specify a domain for access to request cookies.</span></span>

### 

<span key="f78812c59e1745198793480218e35d4a"><span offset-key="f78812c59e1745198793480218e35d4a:0">Sending requests from scripts</span></span>

<span key="d6252be15d4b4309b6d42c32e16a3caf"><span offset-key="d6252be15d4b4309b6d42c32e16a3caf:0">You can use the </span>`pm.sendRequest`<span offset-key="d6252be15d4b4309b6d42c32e16a3caf:2"> method to send a request asynchronously from a </span>**Pre-request**<span offset-key="d6252be15d4b4309b6d42c32e16a3caf:4"> or </span>**Test**<span offset-key="d6252be15d4b4309b6d42c32e16a3caf:6"> script. This allows you to execute logic in the background if you are carrying out computation or sending multiple requests at the same time without waiting for each to complete. You can avoid blocking issues by adding a callback function so that your code can respond when Postman receives a response. You can then carry out any additional processing you need on the response data.</span></span>

<span key="c0b9633ccc1b4485abea5b23d6b55503"><span offset-key="c0b9633ccc1b4485abea5b23d6b55503:0">You can pass the </span>`pm.sendRequest`<span offset-key="c0b9633ccc1b4485abea5b23d6b55503:2"> method a URL string, or can provide a complete request configuration in JSON including headers, method, body, </span></span><a href="http://www.postmanlabs.com/postman-collection/Request.html#~definition" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a0cb4cee0570445da7b699647c3a0dc8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="a586be05e5ca414782b175f0679c022a"><span data-offset-key="a586be05e5ca414782b175f0679c022a:0">and more</span></span></span></a><span key="1a3cce5a04fd40ea9672dd1145ebf422"><span offset-key="1a3cce5a04fd40ea9672dd1145ebf422:0">.</span></span>

1

<span key="af5758833a6b49ca84d40b971be038c1"><span offset-key="af5758833a6b49ca84d40b971be038c1:0">// Example with a plain string URL</span></span>

2

<span key="c19c5bdd6ac646308cb1aa6d6b132fac"><span offset-key="c19c5bdd6ac646308cb1aa6d6b132fac:0">pm.sendRequest('https://postman-echo.com/get', (error, response) => {</span></span>

5

<span key="6e29e99370e14003830e792f0c6ea93b"><span offset-key="6e29e99370e14003830e792f0c6ea93b:0"> } else {</span></span>

6

<span key="a52a5822a38f490fb7075002c5e90bc0"><span offset-key="a52a5822a38f490fb7075002c5e90bc0:0"> console.log(response);</span></span>

7

<span key="93c4797b7e2440d79f0bc42c2ae4aca9"><span offset-key="93c4797b7e2440d79f0bc42c2ae4aca9:0"> }</span></span>

<span key="2085c0210ba749f598e171e0a0b90a80"><span offset-key="2085c0210ba749f598e171e0a0b90a80:0">See the </span></span><a href="http://www.postmanlabs.com/postman-collection/Request.html#~definition" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="598530e1768e411aae94417b5c3add93" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="7db94a2008104854a3a6e8f38e69614b"><span data-offset-key="7db94a2008104854a3a6e8f38e69614b:0">Request definition</span></span></span></a><span key="f2fb9bbd53ff4474b1dd4d636d4779e5"><span offset-key="f2fb9bbd53ff4474b1dd4d636d4779e5:0"> and </span></span><a href="http://www.postmanlabs.com/postman-collection/Response.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="739283efd2e2445995a30f1541d1fc06" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="e092c561d6b548c09065e05a1cb909c4"><span data-offset-key="e092c561d6b548c09065e05a1cb909c4:0">Response structure</span></span></span></a><span key="b40e15d078bc4104942fe6ddecda70d5"><span offset-key="b40e15d078bc4104942fe6ddecda70d5:0"> reference docs for more detail.</span></span>

## 

<span key="72443b9b3ca548c5afb66d3b9c32ad7f"><span offset-key="72443b9b3ca548c5afb66d3b9c32ad7f:0">Scripting workflows</span></span>

<span key="7877af6ebc5048cd9c9f435800603064"><span offset-key="7877af6ebc5048cd9c9f435800603064:0">The </span>`postman`<span offset-key="7877af6ebc5048cd9c9f435800603064:2"> object provides the </span>`setNextRequest`<span offset-key="7877af6ebc5048cd9c9f435800603064:4"> method for building request workflows when you use the </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/running-collections/building-workflows/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="83b720792c984358a6d0fd0c0dc5c4a8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="2398299387c74778a37fa74679556ac8"><span data-offset-key="2398299387c74778a37fa74679556ac8:0">collection runner</span></span></span></a><span key="df5f3db3022f41aa9b628567ae258be3"><span offset-key="df5f3db3022f41aa9b628567ae258be3:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/running-collections/using-newman-cli/command-line-integration-with-newman/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a52383c4af3f4306ae5b98be6e70a043" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="d5c92ac4e78b41eeb4368b5b3c45ccb8"><span data-offset-key="d5c92ac4e78b41eeb4368b5b3c45ccb8:0">Newman</span></span></span></a><span key="e1f9fe9961f24ac4b3f5e89a602a3dee"><span offset-key="e1f9fe9961f24ac4b3f5e89a602a3dee:0">.</span></span>

> <span key="0f314e8b2d5e4a23a7dd06981ce521c5"><span offset-key="0f314e8b2d5e4a23a7dd06981ce521c5:0">Note that </span>`setNextRequest`<span offset-key="0f314e8b2d5e4a23a7dd06981ce521c5:2"> has no effect when you run requests using the </span>**Send**<span offset-key="0f314e8b2d5e4a23a7dd06981ce521c5:4"> button, it only comes into effect when you run a collection.</span></span>

<span key="f91f81520e3b4614ae0a3b4c0dbd068d"><span offset-key="f91f81520e3b4614ae0a3b4c0dbd068d:0">When you run a collection (using the collection runner or Newman), Postman will run your requests in a default order or an order you specify when you set up the run. However, you can override this execution order using </span>`postman.setNextRequest`<span offset-key="f91f81520e3b4614ae0a3b4c0dbd068d:2"> to specify which request should run next.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="970b97bfa299437f93f82a0ad1926f8b"><span offset-key="970b97bfa299437f93f82a0ad1926f8b:0">Run the specified request after this one (the request name as defined in the collection e.g. "Get customers"):</span></span>

1

<span key="64044395b9684100a25b5da5b6aafb87"><span offset-key="64044395b9684100a25b5da5b6aafb87:0">postman.setNextRequest(requestName:String):Function</span></span>

## 

<span key="8d43b85e045346a4b9c2f29d864c587e"><span offset-key="8d43b85e045346a4b9c2f29d864c587e:0">Writing test assertions</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="452d41b61a4848afbb703d6af2c7e5b8">`pm.test(testName:String,                                                 specFunction:Function):Function`</span>

<span key="723fc274b2b140d0a914f49893c1efd6"><span offset-key="723fc274b2b140d0a914f49893c1efd6:0">You can use </span>`pm.test`<span offset-key="723fc274b2b140d0a914f49893c1efd6:2"> to write test specifications inside either the </span>**Pre-request**<span offset-key="723fc274b2b140d0a914f49893c1efd6:4"> or </span>**Tests**<span offset-key="723fc274b2b140d0a914f49893c1efd6:6"> scripts. Tests include a name and assertion—Postman will output test results as part of the response.</span></span>

<span key="e392db0cc6824d89a1d04ad11b61d329"><span offset-key="e392db0cc6824d89a1d04ad11b61d329:0">The </span>`pm.test`<span offset-key="e392db0cc6824d89a1d04ad11b61d329:2"> method returns the </span>`pm`<span offset-key="e392db0cc6824d89a1d04ad11b61d329:4"> object, making the call chainable. The following sample test checks that a response is valid to proceed.</span></span>

1

<span key="26a9cbaa3304417494c0c8d37558e026"><span offset-key="26a9cbaa3304417494c0c8d37558e026:0">pm.test("response should be okay to process", function () {</span></span>

2

<span key="b9044027f95a48a6aae85dd4770bd403"><span offset-key="b9044027f95a48a6aae85dd4770bd403:0"> pm.response.to.not.be.error;</span></span>

3

<span key="26f0ac29694941e2aeedf03024cb6886"><span offset-key="26f0ac29694941e2aeedf03024cb6886:0"> pm.response.to.have.jsonBody('');</span></span>

4

<span key="d6b68ce7bc93463aa1e457a94bc7f68f"><span offset-key="d6b68ce7bc93463aa1e457a94bc7f68f:0"> pm.response.to.not.have.jsonBody('error');</span></span>

5

<span key="ebb8bd5e66384f1fba89a56762a0d3b9"><span offset-key="ebb8bd5e66384f1fba89a56762a0d3b9:0">});</span></span>

Copied!

    <span key="25b5c209ed8d462dae1992dba9b697ce"><span offset-key="25b5c209ed8d462dae1992dba9b697ce:0">Get the total number of tests executed from a specific location in code:</span></span>

1

<span key="d89761a035c74ac89d40a53131e5d6e0"><span offset-key="d89761a035c74ac89d40a53131e5d6e0:0">pm.test.index():Function → Number</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="a02b5dd4eabf4691805c4ce8d596170d"><span offset-key="a02b5dd4eabf4691805c4ce8d596170d:0">The </span>`pm.expect`<span offset-key="a02b5dd4eabf4691805c4ce8d596170d:2"> method allows you to write assertions on your response data, using </span></span><a href="https://www.chaijs.com/api/bdd/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="036178156cf5445185fde969b94d45b5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="174f338031e249e581db936bae0c097d"><span data-offset-key="174f338031e249e581db936bae0c097d:0">ChaiJS expect BDD</span></span></span></a><span key="ca51d882a2264776af05dea01ce8ad4c"><span offset-key="ca51d882a2264776af05dea01ce8ad4c:0"> syntax.</span></span>

1

<span key="1ad559ba34e149838cceeb817d86d73b"><span offset-key="1ad559ba34e149838cceeb817d86d73b:0">pm.expect(assertion:\*):Function → Assertion</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="912fb64b43644c04aa9a68fa887e55dc"><span offset-key="912fb64b43644c04aa9a68fa887e55dc:0">You can also use </span>`pm.response.to.have.*`<span offset-key="912fb64b43644c04aa9a68fa887e55dc:2"> and </span>`pm.response.to.be.*`<span offset-key="912fb64b43644c04aa9a68fa887e55dc:4"> to build your assertions.</span></span>

<span key="8101903a8081463998b89f3b9a8804be"><span offset-key="8101903a8081463998b89f3b9a8804be:0">See </span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/test-examples/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="52fcb34bd14645ecb208635c8727996e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="2a26bb72878a4e23b031d899b562af55"><span data-offset-key="2a26bb72878a4e23b031d899b562af55:0">Test examples</span></span></span></a><span key="cab6fbed36a74f2b8499535fc40f5238"><span offset-key="cab6fbed36a74f2b8499535fc40f5238:0"> for more assertions.</span></span>

## 

<span key="7bcd059f23dd47b29c50a08864e9b219"><span offset-key="7bcd059f23dd47b29c50a08864e9b219:0">Using external libraries</span></span>

1

<span key="1d67b510e50c49f4bc8b6234dbe48aa2"><span offset-key="1d67b510e50c49f4bc8b6234dbe48aa2:0">require(moduleName:String):function → \*</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="7c0c1a6ae1f8410192eaa41b1a08f888"><span offset-key="7c0c1a6ae1f8410192eaa41b1a08f888:0">The </span>`require`<span offset-key="7c0c1a6ae1f8410192eaa41b1a08f888:2"> method allows you to use the sandbox built-in library modules. The list of available libraries is listed below with links to the corresponding documentation.</span></span>

    <span key="68c5756b22fc425eb58661332c53b9c9"><span offset-key="68c5756b22fc425eb58661332c53b9c9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://nodejs.org/api/querystring.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4d9d7c7021a74945b4a7a59d098e3ad0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="346f0dc7f500412dbb7db281b52bc443"><span data-offset-key="346f0dc7f500412dbb7db281b52bc443:0">querystring</span></span></span></a><span key="e68744e37ce7497a9e298a2fab89dd5b"><span offset-key="e68744e37ce7497a9e298a2fab89dd5b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="9e5a90a36337481ea2431d5f96e65435"><span offset-key="9e5a90a36337481ea2431d5f96e65435:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://nodejs.org/api/string_decoder.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c79f87a86f8044989d98b8ecc0ff3090" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="439f8c4bd6c745e796cec5f13d5ae152"><span data-offset-key="439f8c4bd6c745e796cec5f13d5ae152:0">string-decoder</span></span></span></a><span key="767071474fde46058c669167528b3287"><span offset-key="767071474fde46058c669167528b3287:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="06b08ae8ece24c8887045501431aefd0"><span offset-key="06b08ae8ece24c8887045501431aefd0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://nodejs.org/api/stream.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="25341a6e9e7140118738d870f8022c6d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="a17c6ea31d644a9c946d431cd2cc9607"><span data-offset-key="a17c6ea31d644a9c946d431cd2cc9607:0">stream</span></span></span></a><span key="3fb2e22892144875b636fd6da718be63"><span offset-key="3fb2e22892144875b636fd6da718be63:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="8300065158e8403fb3feb872bfa526fc"><span offset-key="8300065158e8403fb3feb872bfa526fc:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://nodejs.org/api/timers.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0b4997ccf4d048ac85b6072bb90b057d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="18b796d83dee4981aa76ce208fbc89df"><span data-offset-key="18b796d83dee4981aa76ce208fbc89df:0">timers</span></span></span></a><span key="0d17dac1ac5f4f4d93d21f8fac2d2014"><span offset-key="0d17dac1ac5f4f4d93d21f8fac2d2014:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="7a1387cc87e54e839c91417b5741e2d0"><span offset-key="7a1387cc87e54e839c91417b5741e2d0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://nodejs.org/api/events.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="59cbc978cd4a40c19621dc4f4efda940" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-7231_259-7232-237__"><span data-key="824aa61c24f84e68beafd7526e418956"><span data-offset-key="824aa61c24f84e68beafd7526e418956:0">events</span></span></span></a><span key="0e29177e70e24cef8209e106aefc0751"><span offset-key="0e29177e70e24cef8209e106aefc0751:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="eafc9653bbe0433187142d0bd02292b4"><span offset-key="eafc9653bbe0433187142d0bd02292b4:0">In order to use a library, call the </span>`require`<span offset-key="eafc9653bbe0433187142d0bd02292b4:2"> method, pass the module name as a parameter, and assign the return object from the method to a variable.</span></span>

## 

<span key="8577049fdfa04d76b31d6111ffd72913"><span offset-key="8577049fdfa04d76b31d6111ffd72913:0">Next steps</span></span>
